entities.name: deluminator
entities.description: The Deluminator is an object that can remove street lamps. It was mentioned as being held up by Harry in Chapter 19.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's name was mentioned by Hermione and Harry after a long time since he left. Ron is a person who has been absent from the scene for some time.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is present in the scene with Harry and Ron. She is mentioned as being skeptical and curious about what happened.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is present in the scene with Hermione and Ron. He is mentioned as remembering something about Ron's name.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: A Portkey is an object that can transport people from one place to another. It was mentioned by Ron as being similar to the ball of light he saw.

entities.name: room
entities.description: The room where Ron was when he used the Deluminator is a location where something happened.

relationships.description: Ron used the Deluminator to remove the light in his room.
Harry remembered something about Ron's name that Hermione mentioned.
Ron compared the ball of light he saw to a Portkey.
